conbody.p: The use of quotation marks in this manual is specified as follows:

li.p: Coordinate items are identified by the symbol "".
Single step item is identified by the symbol "" and multiple items in sequence are identified by numbers.
Sub-items (coordinate items in the table) are identified by the symbol "".
The user interface display (for example button prompt, window title and menu) are identified with black characters.
Keys of the keyboard are identified by the symbol "<>".
For mouse-related operations in this manual, such as Click, Select, and Press, the left mouse button is used. A specific indication will be given if the middle wheel or right mouse button is used.
The user interface of the system is the viewpoint, menu and button, Both the Chinese and English interfaces are supported.

conbody.p: Descriptions of single help information item:
